This is on an extremely grey line for me. On one hand it is extremely good rape/mind break with exceptional art, on the other hand it is not only NTR, but seemingly dips its toe into “hard“ NTR a bit too much...even though the ending very much implies he was mind controlled and then had his memory of her wiped in the end.  I’m still never a fan of the MC finding out in NTR, and any amount of them “watching” the girl, especially when it focuses on the guys’ emotions over the sex, is still over the line for me. I’ll need to read a translation to see how conscious he was during the sex to decide if I can favorite or not, in the mean time I’ll see if this artist has anything more tolerable to me, cause their art truly is fantastic.
I shall wait for the english version patiently....
